name: RECTONE
description:
RECTONE

A game that I made, during ACM2021 game jam, under the theme "ONE ACTION, MANY USES"

There's an in game tutorial that links each function with the associated buttons, by pressing the spawn button, you'll create a block that you can move around for a tiny amount of time, then it will freeze making itself immobile, this is one action that you could use to pass each level of the game, you have a limited number of blocks, which you can increase by the given consumable in each level, if you don't have any blocks left and you failed the level, you will start from level 1 again. I hope you like it.

Let me know what do you think in the comments below.

Thanks for playing ^_^

Credits:

SFX + MUSIC: Freesound.org

Font by tinyworlds

PS4 Buttons by arks
